name: Battle Royale Survival
description:
Battle Royale Survival is a Battle Royale game set in a cartoon styled world.
Fight against players or bots.

There can be a maximum of 20 players per game.
Fight up to 99 bots.
Drops will supply the battlefield.

Choose from one of the 5 characters available and get in on the action.

Features:
* Choice of 5 characters.
* A Battle Royale map.
* Bots.
* Drop system.
